executeLaw(address,uint16,bytes,uint256).details: Called by the Powers protocol during action execution

params.lawCalldata: The calldata containing targets, values, and calldatas arrays

returns.calldatas: Array of calldata for each call
returns.values: Array of ETH values to send

executeLaw(address,uint16,bytes,uint256).notice: Executes the law's logic: validation -> handling request -> call external -> replying to Powers

handleRequest(address,address,uint16,byt.notice: Return calls provided by the user without modification
